div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1694 Benha (anc. Athribis), 50 km. N of (142) Cairo, 1936 Burial: c. 217 B.C. Contents: 50+ AV Ptolemy II: 16 octadr. (Arsinoe type = Alexandreia 10, Salamis 1, Citium 2, Tyre 3) ANS 1944.100.49263 1 pentadr. (Soter type = Tyre) Ptolemy III: 6 octadr. (Berenice type = Ephesus 1, Arsinoe type = Berytus 1, Joppa 1, Tyre 1, Theon-Adelphon type = Alexandreia 2) ANS 1944.100.49263 3 tetradr. (Theon-Adelphon = Alexandreia) Ptolemy IV: 3 octadr. (Ptolemy III por- trait = Alexandreia 2, Sidon 1) Disposition: New York 2; Adda 17 Brett, ANSMN 5 (1952), pp. 1-8, illus.
